description.en: A compact bucket-style shoulder bag with a clean silhouette and adjustable strap. Features a zip-top opening and roomy interior that fits daily essentials like phone, wallet, small notebook, and chargers. OEM/ODM customization available for fabric (including recycled options), size, strap spec, logo patch, lining, pockets, zippers & hardware, and packaging.
description.zh: 轻便水桶单肩包，造型简洁，肩带可调。顶部拉链开合，内部空间可容纳手机、钱包、小本子与充电器等日常随身物品。支持 OEM/ODM 定制：面料（可选再生环保材料）、尺寸、肩带规格、Logo 工艺、内里、口袋结构、拉链五金与包装等。

en: Outer: Nylon / Polyester (customizable; recycled options available)
Logo: Woven label / rubber patch / embroidery (customizable)
zh: 面料：尼龙/涤纶（可定制；可选再生环保材料）
闭合方式：顶部拉链闭合（可选 YKK）
肩带：可调节织带肩带（可定制）
五金：调节扣/D 环/挂钩等（可定制）

en.Customization: Fabric, color, size, strap spec, logo, lining, pockets, zipper & hardware, packaging

zh.参考尺寸: 宽 20–26cm × 高 18–24cm × 深 8–12cm（可定制）
zh.适用场景: 日常随身、通勤、旅行收纳
zh.可定制: 面料配色、尺寸、肩带规格、Logo、内里、口袋结构、拉链五金、包装
